iati-activity.title: CLTS in Koulikoro, Segou and Mopti
iati-activity.description: This project is a response to the needs of access to drinking water & adequate sanitation for vulnerable communities in Mali. It is a contribution towards achieving the Country Programme objectives, it will cover 50 WaterAid in Mali intervention villages. To this end, it is in a local response to the Country Programme's strategic objectives, especially for promoting the CLTS, improving access to water, hygiene and sanitation services, raising the status of sanitation at national and local level, action research and disseminating good practice.

contact-info.mailing-address: Open data at WaterAid, 47-49 Durham Street, London, SE11 5JD, UK
